name: Should return 403 when registering a user without a name
description:
Verify that a user cannot be registered without a name.
Expected result: HTTP 403 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "Email, password and name are required fields" in response body.
descriptionHtml:
Verify that a user cannot be registered without a name.
Expected result: HTTP 403 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "Email, password and name are required fields" in response body.

testStage.description:
Verify that a user cannot be registered without a name.
Expected result: HTTP 403 response, response field "success" - false and an error message "Email, password and name are required fields" in response body.

steps.name: Assert that user is not registered

parameters.name: responseBody
parameters.value: Email, password and name are required fields
